product_name: REI Grande Double-Walled Cup - 16 fl. oz.
long_description: Swing by your favorite coffee shop to refill your 16 fl. oz. REI Grande double-walled cup. It saves a paper cup from the landfill or recycle bin, and keeps your morning beverage warm for up to 30 min. Double-wall, stainless-steel construction keeps a drink hot or cold while you make your way. Silicone lid presses on securely; lid is not spill-proof but will keep sloshing spills to a minimum. Fits in vehicle cup holders and some bike water bottle cages. The REI Grande double-walled cup holds 16 fl. oz.
short_description: Swing by your favorite coffee shop to refill your 16 fl. oz. REI Grande double-walled cup. It saves a paper cup from the landfill or recycle bin, and keeps your morning beverage warm for up to 30 min.
